page.title: Stocks Slip, Investors Wary Before Intel
page.text: NEW YORK (Reuters) - U.S. stocks slipped on Tuesday as investors showed caution ahead of tech bellwether Intel Corp.'s <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=INTC.O target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">INTC.O</A> earnings, while disappointing results from State Street Corp. <A HREF="http://www.investor.reuters.com/FullQuote.aspx?ticker=STT.N target=/stocks/quickinfo/fullquote">STT.N</A> cast a cloud over the banking sector.
